actions-list.actionItem: The House proceeded with one minute speeches which by direction of the Chair, would be limited to 15 per side of the aisle.
The Chair designated Mr. Thompson of PA to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Chaplain Judy Malana, United States Navy Joint Congressional Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies Staff
The House convened, returning from a recess continuing the legislative day of January 23.
The Speaker announced that the House do now recess. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 P.M. today.
The House proceeded with Morning-Hour Debate. At the conclusion of Morning-Hour, the House will recess until 12:00 p.m. for the start of legislative business.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Steve Womack to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
